Xtal1 

alignment by XRFtomo
---------------------> Xtal1_align1


(1) Turn negative values to zeros,
(2) Remove hot spots in abs_ic by median filter
(3) Replace the value of abs_ic where the value < 2.0E-4 to the the maxima value in abs_ic
(4) Scale abs_ic
abs_ic_adjusted: scale abs_ic so that the maxima value is 1.
(2)Adjust ds_ic
ds_ic_adjusted = us_ic * abs_ic_adjusted
-------------------------------------------------------------> Xtal1_align1_adjusted1
